author: markt
msg: When setting the write listener and configuring a dispatch for the first write, also set registeredForWrite to avoid multiple write registrations.

author: markt
msg: Remove unnecessary code. For async, the necessary read/write registrations will already have been made.

author: markt
msg: Remove the distinction between internal and external write registration to avoid multiple write registrations.

author: markt
msg: When setting the write listener and configuring a dispatch for the first write, also set registeredForWrite to avoid multiple write registrations.
